backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that includes a blob storage mixin and exposes a `getQuotes` query returning a hardcoded list of four humorous philosophical quotes.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary of the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the app titled 'Cash's Famous Philosophy' that mounts the React app via a root div and loads the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders `QuotesPage` inside an `ErrorBoundary` with a persistent `Footer` containing a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Class-based React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a warm earthy fallback UI with a 'Try again' button; shows error details in dev mode.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCard.tsx: Styled article component that renders a single `Quote` with decorative quotation marks, wobble transforms, accent symbols, a numbered badge, and a Cash attribution footer.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCardSkeleto: Loading skeleton placeholder for a quote card using themed `Skeleton` blocks to maintain layout during data fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication hook and provider that manages AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout state, and exposes identity context to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook `useGetQuotes` that fetches quotes from the backend actor once available, with 3 retries and exponential backoff up to 30 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Main CSS file importing Zilla Slab and Caveat fonts, defining a warm earthy OKLCH color palette, card wobble transforms, text shadow utilities, and quote cycling transition classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps `App` with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays quotes in a cycling carousel with fade transitions, dot indicators, and skeleton/error/empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Zilla Slab, Caveat), an oklch-based warm color palette (amber, cream, espresso), and extended border radius/container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracker documenting known issues (backend unreachable on all platforms, quotes disappearing after deployment) and pending action items to fix canister connectivity and ensure all quotes persist in main.mo.
